import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import {uc} from './UserContext' import { useContext } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Nav.css'; function Navbar() { const ucReceive = useContext(uc) const onLogout=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() ucReceive.setUser({ isLoggedIn:false, currrentUserId: null, currentUserName: null }) a return (
